issue.title: [Python] flake8 warnings are not failing CI builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1430](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1430). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I think this is because the flake8 calls are inside a bash function. We'll need to do a bit of work on our CI scripts to make sure the `set -e` results in flake8 call propagating the error code
